name: Type Dungeon (jy286)
description:
Type Dungeon combines deck building rogue-like elements with fast-paced speed typing action. Type out words to cast cards, power yourself up, and defeat enemies in the dungeon.

Note 1: we didn't get time to do a loading screen, please be patient at the start! Shouldn't take long (16mb).

Note 2: the game unfortunately doesn’t work with Safari, please use another browser :(

We had a bunch of ideas that didn't make it into this short taster:

  • cooler powerups,
  • UX improvements,
  • pause menu,
  • a way to see the cards in your deck,
  • a way to add cards to your deck,
  • upgrade your cards,
  • etc

Hopefully you get the idea :P

Card effects so far:

  • Direct damage
  • Heal
  • Leech (damages enemy and heals you)
  • Add shield
  • Poison (1 damage every second)
  • Slowness (makes letters disappear more slowly)
  • Glass cannon (deal double damage but hurt self if you make a mistake)
  • Berserk (deal double base damage, take half base damage yourself)
  • Word length modifiers (extremely cursed)

Made for the 2020 Mix and Game Jam using Phaser by Jamie Yung and Cameron Yung

Artwork - Cameron Yung

Music - Cameron Yung

SFX - Cameron Yung

Programming - Jamie Yung

Font used: Monoid
